Ultra-slim Elegance, Compact Digital Camera, Special Effects and Filter Effects (Soft, Miniature, Cross Screen, Selective Color), Monitor: 5-level Brightness Adjustment, Lens Construction: 5 Elements in 5 Groups, Focus Range: 0.5 m (W) - 1.0 m (T), Focus-area Selection: Face Priority, Auto (9-area Automatic Selection), Center, Manual with 99 Focus Areas, Subject Tracking, Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode): 98% Horizontal and 98% Vertical, Frame Coverage (Playback Mode): 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Continuous Shooting: Single (Default Setting), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16, Exposure Control: Programmed Auto Exposure with Motion Detection and Exposure Compensation ( 2 EV in increments of 1/3 EV), Mechanical Shutter and Charge-coupled Electronic Shutter, Aperture: Electronically-controlled ND Filter (-3.3 AV) Selection, Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes, Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, Input / Output Terminal; Audio / Video Output, Digital Input / Output (USB), Charging Time: 2 hrs 30 min (Using Charging AC Adapter EH-69P), Battery Life (EN-EL19) Still Pictures: 190 Shots, Movies: 1 hrs 30 min HD 720p (1280 x 720), Each Movie is Limited to File Size 2 GB, Movie Length 29 min, Tripod Socket, Operating Temperature: 0° C - 40° C, Humidity: 85%
